document_data.name: Grab Grass
document_data.mainbody: '''Grab grass''' was a thick, tall and tough variety of [[grass]] whose name was derived from the fact that people often became entangled in it.
document_data.Description: The blades of this variety of grass typically grew to heights of {{SIrange|3|5|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Habitats:
Grab grass was typically found on plains and hills, deep in the forests of the [[Feywild]]. On the [[Prime Material plane]], it existed in areas where the Feywild's [[magic]] filtered through.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Finding Harmony|16}}

In the [[Abyss]], grab grass could be found in the [[Screaming Jungle]].
